title: Millennial celebrities who are bringing back the mini skirt
text: Somewhere in a far-off land, Cher Wolowitz and Carrie Bradshaw are silently approving the comeback of the mini skirt. Full props to the millennial celebrity brigade in Bollywood for single-handedly bringing back the classic trend into our lives. Ananya Panday and Janhvi Kapoor have managed to sport the trend in versatile ways. Whether they’re hitting the red carpet, or flexing their off-duty style while enjoying a Sunday brunch at Bastian, the young actresses have decoded multiple ways of wearing the tiny silhouette. Here’s a list of different ways in which you can style the ‘it’ trend of the season.
description: Ananya Panday, Janhvi Kapoor and other millennial celebrities are bringing back the mini skirt trend. Here’s all you need to know.
